name: Asphodel
description:
In this surreal, mysterious dreamscape, the player must find a specific key in a maze of almost identical objects before time runs out, lest they be trapped in the maze forever. Goaded and guided by an ominous figure who identifies only as god, and doomed to endlessly search for the “needle in the haystack”, the player must wake themselves up with the aid of the key.

Use WASD keys to move, space to jump, and click "e" to select an object you think is the key. If you've guess correctly, you'll win the game! If you don't....good luck.

By Alex, Kenny, Sage & Tina !!
